channel.title: BakkesMod Programming Wiki
channel.description: Recent content on BakkesMod Programming Wiki

item.title: CARBODY
item.description: View Implementation A list of car body IDs. This is really outdated (early 2017?), so you'll likely need to find or write a new one for any plugins you make. If you make one make a code snippet and we'll link to it from here CAR_BACKFIRE = 21 CAR_BREAKOUT = 22 CAR_BREAKOUTTYPES = 1416 CAR_OCTANE = 23 CAR_OCTANEZSR = 1568 CAR_PALADIN = 24 CAR_ROADHOG = 25 CAR_ROADHOGXL = 1300

item.title: NOTIFIER_PERMISSION
item.description: View Implementation PERMISSION_ALL = 0 PERMISSION_MENU = (1 << 0) PERMISSION_SOCCAR = (1 << 1) PERMISSION_FREEPLAY = (1 << 2) PERMISSION_CUSTOM_TRAINING = (1 << 3) PERMISSION_ONLINE = (1 << 4) PERMISSION_PAUSEMENU_CLOSED = (1 << 5) PERMISSION_REPLAY = (1 << 6) PERMISSION_OFFLINE = (1 << 7)

item.title: OnlinePlatform

item.title: ToastType
item.description: View Implementation Possible colors for Toasts. ToastType_Info is black, ToastType_OK is green, ToastType_Warning is orange, and ToastType_Error is red ToastType_Info = 0 ToastType_OK = 1 ToastType_Warning = 2 ToastType_Error = 3

item.title: UNLOCKMETHOD
item.description: View Implementation Ways an item can be earned Default = 0 Drop = 1 Special = 2 Reward = 3 DLC = 4 Never = 5 MAX_ = 6
